meanings.definition: To apply a new skin or covering to something.
meanings.sent1: She reskins her phone to give it a fresh look.
meanings.sent2: He reskins his laptop with a colorful cover.
meanings.sent3: The artist reskins the sculpture with a shiny material for a modern touch.
meanings.sent4: The decorator reskins the walls with a vibrant wallpaper to transform the room.
meanings.sent5: The chef reskins the dish with a sprinkle of herbs for added flavor.

meanings.definition: The act of applying a new skin or covering to something.
meanings.sent1: The reskins of the furniture made it look brand new.
meanings.sent2: She bought reskins for her old notebooks to protect them.
meanings.sent3: The reskins of the books in the library made them more appealing.
meanings.sent4: The reskins of the cars in the showroom attracted many customers.
meanings.sent5: The reskins of the gadgets in the store caught the attention of shoppers.
